feed.subtitle: Personal website of Johnny Zhang @ University of Notre Dame.

entry.title: New Personal Website
entry.content: I am excited to announce the launch of my new personal website! After months of hard work and dedication, the new site is finally live and ready for visitors. The new website features a modern design, improved navigation, and a host of new features to enhance user experience. You can now easily access my portfolio, blog, and contact information all in one place.
entry.summary: Johnny's new personal website is now live! Check out the new features and design.
